00229 #define phonetic(s)   stgxlate(s,PHONETIC)
00230 #ifdef GREEK
00231 #define latinize(s)   stgxlate(s,LATINIZE)
00232 #define tolatin(c)    (LATINIZE[c]?LATINIZE[c]:(c))
00233 #else
00234 #define latinize(s)   (s)
00235 #define tolatin(c)    (c)
00236 #endif
